text: Erik Leif Haugelund Hermansen (2 November 1925 - 27 December 2005) was a Danish rower. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's eight where they were eliminated in the semi-finals repêchage. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Danish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Denmark Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:People from Frederiksværk Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Leif Hermansen
